attributes.action: prevent Lloyds TSB from closing Interpals account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Interpal is a leading charity that helps Palestinians in need. IBB (Islamic Bank of Britain) has a clearing account with Lloyds TSB and are being pressurised by them to close Interpals account. At a time when humanitarian needs in Gaza are so desperate, it is an inhumane decision that will affect many lives.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent Lloyds TSB from closing Interpals account."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19463


Prime Minister's Office
